title: Bloomberg Markets: Surevest's Luna on Market’s Resilience
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Surevest's Luna on Market’s Resilience
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Robert Luna\u0010CEO/Chief Investment Strategist\u0010Surevest Wealth Management\u0010Discussing the markets continued resilience in the face of current geopolitical events.
